chooseOTP.en: Would you like to use two-factor authentication based on Google Authenticator?

chooseOTPca.en: The option 'yes' or 'optional' may ask you to read QR code. Please prepare your mobile Google OTP app

yesDesc.en: Always turn ON Google authentication for all service providers

optDesc.en: Optionally ON only for the service provider explicitly asking 2-factor authentication (Default OFF)

qrcode.en: Read the QR code with Google Authenticator app, and type the verification code below

verificationcodeloss.en: Contact your IT administrator or check your past email box, if you lost your QR code or Google authenticator

2factor_loginfail.en: Please enable 2FA to use this service.
